response.raw:
Here is my attempt at the requested memo:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
To: Supervising Attorney
From: [Paralegal name]
Date: [Current date]
Re: Preparation of Affidavits and Document Organization

This memo summarizes the steps taken to prepare affidavits and other legal documents as requested, as well as to organize and maintain the documents in our filing system.

Affidavit Preparation:
- Drafted affidavits for witnesses John Smith and Jane Doe in the Robertson v. Acme Company litigation
- Obtained signed and notarized affidavits from both witnesses
- Filed electronic copies of the executed affidavits in the case folder on the firm's document management system

Legal Correspondence:
- Prepared a legal demand letter to the defendant in the Robertson case, for review by supervising attorney
- Sent the approved demand letter to defendant via certified mail with return receipt requested
- Saved an electronic copy of the demand letter in the case folder

Document Organization and Maintenance: 
- Organized all case documents, correspondence, and pleadings in chronological order in the physical case file
- Scanned and saved electronic copies of all documents in the electronic case folder, with documents named by date and description for easy searching
- Created an index of all documents in the physical and electronic case files
- Will continue to maintain the case files in an organized manner as additional documents are received or generated

Please let me know if you need anything further.
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
